name: penknife-lang
description: A language that emphasizes freedom of command.
author: Rocketnia

scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run build && npm test
scripts.build-arc-host-dir: rainbow-js-arc init-arc build/test/arc/ && framewarc copy-into build/test/arc/lib/framewarc/
scripts.repl: cd build/test/arc/ && rainbow-js-arc run-compat -e '(= fwarc-dir* "lib/framewarc/" penknife-dir* "../../../")' '(load:+ fwarc-dir* "loadfirst.arc")' '(load:+ penknife-dir* "penknife.arc")' '(pkrepl)'
scripts.test: cd build/test/arc/ && rainbow-js-arc run-compat -e '(= fwarc-dir* "lib/framewarc/" penknife-dir* "../../../")' '(load:+ fwarc-dir* "loadfirst.arc")' '(load:+ penknife-dir* "penknife.arc")' '(pkrepl "[+ arc[\"Hello, \"] arc[\"world!\"]]")' -q
